title: How to Draw a Narwhal

steps.headline: Draw the basic steps of the narwhal.
steps.description: Draw a circle for the face. Then, add the body line. Also add the horn.

steps.headline: Draw the back to the narwhal's back.
Draw the torso of the narwhal.
steps.description: Draw his mouth, his belly, His tail and flipper. Don't forget the outline of the horn.

steps.headline: Draw his eye along with his left flipper

text: Draw the basic steps of the narwhal. Draw a circle for the face. Then, add the body line. Also add the horn. Draw the back to the narwhal's back.  Draw the torso of the narwhal. Draw his mouth, his belly, His tail and flipper. Don't forget the outline of the horn. Draw his eye along with his left flipper  Erase all the (ext.) lines inside the narwhal.
